{{VO
|character               = Tighnari

|name                    = 타이나리

<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title          = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle       = Hello
|vo_01_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx             = 안녕, 난 타이나리야. 아비디야 숲의 순찰관이지. 우림의 생태와 행인의 안전을 책임지고 있어. 만약 이곳이 처음이라면 《아비디야 숲 생존 가이드》를 먼저 읽는 것을 추천할게. 특히 「식용버섯과 독버섯의 구분법」 챕터를 중점적으로 봐줘
|vo_01_01_rm             = Annyeong, nan Tainariya. Abidiya sup-ui sunchalgwaniji. Urim-ui saengtaewa haengin-ui anjeoneul chaegimjigo isseo. Manyak igosi cheoeumiramyeon "Abidiya Sup Saengjon Gaideu"reul meonjeo ilneun geoseul chucheonhalge. Teukhi "Sigyongbeoseotgwa Dokbeoseosui Gubunbeop" chaepteoreul jungjeomjeogeureo bwajwo.
|vo_01_01_tl             = Hi, I'm Tighnari. Forest Watcher of Avidya Forest. I am responsible of the ecology of the rainforest and safety of pedestrians. If it is your first time visiting here, I would recommend you to read "Avidya Forest Survival Guide" first. Pay extra attention on the "How to Distinguish Edible Mushrooms and Poisonous Mushrooms" chapter.
<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title          = 잡담・나뭇잎 책갈피
|vo_02_01_subtitle       = Chat: Leaf Bookmark
|vo_02_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Leaf Bookmark.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx             = 나뭇잎을 말린 다음 종이 사이에 넣어서 끼워두면 예쁘고 유용한 책갈피를 만들 수 있어
|vo_02_01_rm             = Namut'ipeul mallin daeum jong'i saie neoeoseo kkiwodumyeon yeppeugo yuyonghan chaekgalpireul mandeul su isseo.
|vo_02_01_tl             = After drying a leaf and pressing it between paper, you can make a pretty and useful bookmark.

|vo_02_02_title          = 잡담・실수
|vo_02_02_subtitle       = Chat: Mistakes
|vo_02_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Mistakes.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx             = 실수를 두려워하지 마. 실수도 공부의 일환이야
|vo_02_02_rm             = Silsureul duryeowohaji ma. Silsudo gongbu-ui ilhwaniya.
|vo_02_02_tl             = Don't be afraid of mistakes. A mistake is a part of studying, too.

|vo_02_03_title          = 잡담・지식의 가치
|vo_02_03_subtitle       = Chat: The Value of Knowledge
|vo_02_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Chat - The Value of Knowledge.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx             = 지식의 가치는 단순히 돈으로 매길 수 있는 게 아니야
|vo_02_03_rm             = Jisik-ui gachineun dansunhi doneuro maegil su itneun ge aniya.
|vo_02_03_tl             = The value of knowledge is not simply assigned by money.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title          = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle       = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx             = 난 이런 날씨에 적응됐지만, 넌 우산을 쓰는 게 좋을 거야
|vo_03_01_rm             = Nan ireon nalssie jeogeungdwaetjiman, neon usaneul sseuneun ge joeul geoya.
|vo_03_01_tl             = I'm adapted to those kinds of weather, but it would be good if you put up an umbrella.

|vo_03_02_title          = 비가 그친 후…
|vo_03_02_subtitle       = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx             = 내 꼬리는 방수 에센셜 오일을 발라둬서 털어내면 말끔해져
|vo_03_02_rm             = Nae kkorineun bangsu esensyeol oireul balladwoseo teoreonaemyeon malkkeumhaejyeo.
|vo_03_02_tl             = My tail has waterproof essential oil on it, so if I brush it aside, it'll become clean.

|vo_03_03_title          = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle       = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx             = 이런, 천둥소리가 엄청 크네! 윽… 머리가 울릴 정도야
|vo_03_03_rm             = Ireon, cheondungsoriga eomcheong keune! Euk... Meoriga ullil jeongdoya.
|vo_03_03_tl             = Oh no, the sound of thunder is too loud! Ugh... my head is ringing.

|vo_03_04_title          = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle       = When It Snows
|vo_03_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx             = 이런 날씨는 정말 흔치 않은데! 어, 추워? 추우면 손을 내 꼬리 털에 넣어봐
|vo_03_04_rm             = Ireon nalssineun jeongmal heunchi aneunde! Eo, chuwo? Chu'umyeon soneul nae kkori teore neoeobwa.
|vo_03_04_tl             = This weather is really rare! Uh, are you cold? If you're feeling cold, put your hand in my tail fur.

|vo_03_05_title          = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle       = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx             = 귀… 귀가… 바람 때문에 뒤집히겠어!
|vo_03_05_rm             = Gwi... Gwiga... Baram ttaemune dwijipigesseo!
|vo_03_05_tl             = Ear... My ear... will be flipped off because of the wind!

|vo_03_06_title          = 사막에 있을 때…
|vo_03_06_subtitle       = In the Desert
|vo_03_06_file           = VO_{language}{character} In the Desert.ogg
|vo_03_06_tx             = …덥다… 이렇게 독한 햇빛이라면 서리꽃도 녹아버리겠지…? 아, 생각해보니까 그럴 일은 없겠네. 하하… 아, 으윽…
|vo_03_06_rm             = ...Deopda... Ireotge dokhan haetbichiramyeon seorikkotdo nogabeorigetji...? A, saenggakhaebonikka geureol ireul eopgetne. Haha... A, eueuk...
|vo_03_06_tl             = ...Hot... With such strong sunlight like this, Mist Flower Corolla will also melt, right...? Ah, as I think of it, such a thing won't happen. Haha... Ah, ugh...

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title          = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle       = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx             = 들어봐! 아침이슬이 나뭇잎에 떨어지는 소리야
|vo_04_01_rm             = Deureobwa! Achimiseuri namutipe tteoreojineun soriya.
|vo_04_01_tl             = Listen! It's the sound of morning dew falling on leaves.

|vo_04_02_title          = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle       = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx             = 점심시간에는 나무에 앉아서 나뭇가지 사이로 새어 나오는 햇빛을 보며 멍때리는 걸 좋아해. 그러다 보면 어느새 잠들어 버려… 헤헤
|vo_04_02_rm             = Jeomsimsiganeneun namue anjaseo namutgaji sairo sae'eo naoneun haetbicheul bomyeo meongttaerineun geol joahae. Geureoda bomyeon eoneusae jamdeureo beoryeo... Hehe.
|vo_04_02_tl             = At lunchtime, I like spacing out while looking at the sunlight that vents out between branches while sitting on a tree. Then I suddenly fall asleep at some point... hehe.

|vo_04_03_title          = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle       = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx             = 안녕, 야광 식물을 관찰하려고 하는데 같이 갈래?
|vo_04_03_rm             = Annyeong, yagwang sikmureul gwanchalharyeogo haneunde gachi gallae?
|vo_04_03_tl             = Hi, I'm going to observe glow-in-the-dark plants, want to go together?

|vo_04_04_title          = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle       = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx             = 오늘 순찰 일지도 적을 겸, 내가 불침번을 설 테니 좀 자 둬
|vo_04_04_rm             = Oneul sunchal iljido jeogeul gyeom, naega bulchimbeoneul seol teni jom ja dwo.
|vo_04_04_tl             = As I'm going to write today's patrol journal, I'll keep the night watch, so you can sleep a bit.

<!-- About -->
|vo_05_01_title          = {name}자신에 대해・전공
|vo_05_01_subtitle       = About {character}: Profession
|vo_05_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Profession.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx             = 옛날에 학교 다닐 때는 생론파 소속이었어. 주 전공은 식물학이었고. 지도 교수는 내가 졸업하고 학교에 남아서 학생들을 가르치길 원했지만, 솔직히 난 자유롭게 연구하는 환경을 더 좋아하거든. 게다가 내가 관찰한 바로 아카데미아의 일부 일 처리 방식이 마음에 들지 않았어. 교수님이 강요하지 않아서 다행이야&mdash;&mdash;강요한다고 달라질 건 없지만
|vo_05_01_rm             = Yetnare hakgyo danil ttaeneun saengronpa sosogieosseo. Ju jeongong'eun sikmulhagieotgo. Jido gyosuneun naega joreophago hakgyoe namaseo haksaengdeureul gareuchigil wonhaetjiman, soljikhi nan jayuropge yeonguhaneun hwangyeong'eul deo joahageodeun. Gedaga naega gwanchalham baro Akademia-ui ilbu il cheori bangsigi maeume deulji anasseo. Gyosunimi gang'yohaji anaseo dahaeng'iya &mdash; gang'yohandago dallajil geon eopjiman.
|vo_05_01_tl             = When I went to school a long time ago, I was a part of Amurta. My major was botany. My advisor wanted me to teach students by staying at the Akademiya after graduating, but to be honest, I like an environment where I can research freely more. Also, as I have observed, I did not prefer some handling ways of the Akademiya. It's such a relief that the professor did not force me &mdash; even though he does nothing will change.

|vo_05_02_title          = {name}자신에 대해・일족
|vo_05_02_subtitle       = About {character}: Kin
|vo_05_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Kin.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx             = 우리 일족의 성격을 괴팍하다고 여기는 사람이 꽤 많아. 난 그렇게 생각할 수도 있다고 봐. 우리 일족은 수가 적은 데다 대부분 학자라서 연구를 위해 이곳저곳 돌아다니느라 일 년에 한 번 보기도 힘들거든. 우리 아빠는 곤충학자이신데 최근에 사막에서 갑충의 진화 과정을 연구하고 있다고 들었어…. 난 굳이 갈 생각 없어. 부끄러운 말이지만 난 뜨거운 태양은 질색이거든. 오래 쬐고 있으면 머리가 녹을 것처럼 어지러워
|vo_05_02_rm             = Uri iljok-ui seonggyeogeul goepakhadago yeogineun sarami kkawe mana. Nan geureotge saenggakhal sudo itdago bwa. Uri iljogeun suga jeogeun deda daebubun hakjaraseo yeongureul wihae igotjeogot doradanineura il nyeone han beon bogido himdeulgeodeun. Uri appaneun gonchunghakjainde choegune samageseo gapchung-ui jinhwa gwajeong'eul yeon'guhago itdago deureosseo... Nan guji gal saenggak eopsseo. Bukkeureoun marijiman nan tteugeoun taeyang'eun jilsaegigeodeun. Orae jjoego isseumyeon meoriga nogeul geotcheoreom eojireowo.
|vo_05_02_tl             = There are quite a lot of people who consider the personality of our clan as ill-tempered. I mean, we are very few, and most of us are researchers who wander around for one's research, so it's hard to see each other even once in a year. My dad is an entomologist, I heard he is researching the evolution stage of beetles at the deserts recently... I don't want to go there. It is a shameful comment, but I hate the hot sun. If I get sunned for too long, I get dizzy as if my head is going to melt.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title          = 우리에 대해・관계
|vo_06_01_subtitle       = About Us: Getting Along
|vo_06_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Getting Along.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx             = 사람과 사람 사이를 이해하기 가장 좋은 방법은 함께 많은 시간을 보내는 거라고 생각해. 다른 건 다 부질없어. 그러니까 급하게 자기소개할 필요 없어. 시간이 모든 것을 말해 줄 테니까
|vo_06_01_rm             = Saramgwa saram saireul ihaehagi gajang joeun bangbeobeun hamkke maneun siganeul bonaeneun georago saenggakhae. Dareun geon da bujireopsseo. Geureonikka geuphage jagisogaehal piryo eopsseo. Sigani modeun geoseul malhae jul tenikka.
|vo_06_01_tl             = The best way to understand human relationships between each other is to spend a lot of time together. Anything else is all useless. So there is no need to introduce yourself urgently. Time will tell everything.

|vo_06_02_title          = 우리에 대해・친구
|vo_06_02_subtitle       = About Us: Friends
|vo_06_02_friendship     = 6
|vo_06_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Friends.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx             = 우리가 친구냐고? 뭐야, 이런 것까지 인증이 필요한 거야? 그럼 사인해 줄 테니까 어서 네 「친구 증서」를 가지고 와
|vo_06_02_rm             = Uriga chin'gunyago? Mwoya, ireon geotkkaji injeung'i piryohan geoya? Geureom sainhae jul tenikka eoseo ne "Chin'gu Jeungseo"reul gajigo wa.
|vo_06_02_tl             = Are we friends? What, do you need certification for such things? Then, I'll sign it, so give me your "Friend Certificate" quickly.

<!-- Miscellaneous I -->
|vo_07_01_title          = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle       = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship     = 4
|vo_07_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx             = 어릴 때 기도했던 기억이 나. 만약 운 좋게 「신의 눈」을 가지게 된다면 꼭 풀 원소였으면 좋겠다고. 그때는 연구를 위해서가 아니라, 넝쿨 사다리를 만들어서 높은 곳에 달린 과일을 따 먹고 싶었거든
|vo_07_01_rm             = Eoril ttae gidohaetdeon gieogi na. Manyak un jotge "Sin-ui Nun"eul gajige doendamyeon kkok pul wonsoyeosseumyeon jotgetdago. Geuttaeneun yeon'gureul wihaeseoga anira, neongkul sadarireul mandeureoseo nopeun gose dallin gwaireul tta meokgo sipeotgeodeun.
|vo_07_01_tl             = I remember praying when I was young. If I get a "Vision" by any chance, I wished it was Dendro. Then, it was not for research, but I wanted to get fruits in high places by making a vine ladder.

|vo_07_02_title          = 하고 싶은 이야기・아란나라
|vo_07_02_subtitle       = Something to Share: Aranara
|vo_07_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Aranara.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx             = 이 생물에 대해 들은 적은 있지만 한 번도 본 적은 없어. 숲속 깊은 곳에서 가끔 바스락거리는 소리가 들리는데 가까이 다가가면 흔적도 없이 사라지더라고. 오히려 잘 됐지. 어떻게 자신을 보호해야 하는지 아는 거잖아. 밀림 표범을 보고도 다가가서 안부를 묻는 바보 같은 모험가들보다는 훨씬 낫지
|vo_07_02_rm             = I saengmure daehae deureun jeogeun itjiman han beondo bon jeogeun eopsseo. Supsok gipeun goseseo gakkeum baseurakgeorineun soriga deullineunde gakkai dagagamyeon heunjeokdo eopssi sarajideorago. Ohiryeo jal dwaetji. Eotteotge jasineul bohohaeya haneunji aneun geojana. Millim pyobeomeul bogodo dagagaseo anbureul mutneun babo gateun moheomgadeulbodaneun hwolssin natji.
|vo_07_02_tl             = I have heard of this creature, but I've never seen it. I can hear brushing sounds deep in the woods sometimes, but if I get closer, it disappeared without a trace. It's actually a good thing. They know how to protect themselves. They are way better than stupid adventurers who say hello to a jungle leopard.

|vo_07_03_title          = 하고 싶은 이야기・카르카타
|vo_07_03_subtitle       = Something to Share: Karkata
|vo_07_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_07_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Karkata.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx             = 카르카타 일은 걱정 안 해도 돼. 그는 내 연구 조수니까 건드리기 전에 내 확인을 받아야 한다고 잘 아는 풍기관에게 말해뒀어&mdash;&mdash;음, 카르카타가 그렇게 걱정되면 소론파 수업을 들어보는 건 어때? 그러면 나중에 내가 없어도 네가 계속 카르카타를 보살필 수 있을 거야
|vo_07_03_rm             = Kareukata ireun geokjeong an haedo dwae. Geuneun nae yeon'gu josunikka geondeurigi jeone nae hwagineul badaya handago jal aneun punggigwanege malhaedwosseo &mdash; Eum, Kareukataga geureotge geokjeongdoemyeon soronpa sueobeul deureoboneun geon eottae? Geureomyeon najung'e naega eopsseodo nega gyesok Kareukatareul bosalpil su isseul geoya.
|vo_07_03_tl             = You don't have to worry about Karkata. I told a Matra I know well that it is my research assistant, so before people touch it, they should get my permission &mdash; Hmm, if you are that worried about Karkata, why not try listening to a Spantamad class? Then you can keep taking care of Karkata when I'm not there later.

|vo_07_04_title          = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_04_subtitle       = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx             = 그거 알아? 식물도 위장술을 할 줄 알아. 곤충이나 조류로 위장해서 천적을 위협하기도 하고, 미끼를 만들어서 다른 생물을 끌어들여 꽃가루를 나르게 하기도 해. 또 그냥 포식자인 경우도 있는데, 향기로운 냄새나 꿀로 사냥감을 유인하지…. 음, 말하다 보니 식물만 그런 건 아니라는 느낌이 드네
|vo_07_04_rm             = Geugeo ara? Sikmuldo wijangsureul hal jul ara. Gonchung'ina joryuro wijanghaeseo chonjeogeul wihyephagido hago, mikkireul mandeureoseo dareun saeng'mureul kkeureodeuryeo kkotgarureul nareuge hagido hae. Tto geunyang posikjain gyeong'udo itneunde, hyanggiroun naemsaena kkullo sanyanggameul yuinhaji... Eum, malhada boni sikmulman geureon geon aniraneun neukkimi deune.
|vo_07_04_tl             = Do you know this? Plants are able to camouflage themselves as well. They camouflage as insects or birds to threat their natural enemies, and they also make bait to lure other organisms to make them carry pollen. Also, they are sometimes just a predator, they lure their prey with fragrant scent and honey... Hmm, speaking of it, I don't think only plants are like this.

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title          = 콜레이에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle       = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_01_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx             = 그 아이는 데려왔을 당시 글자를 하나도 못 읽었지만 큰 문제는 없었어. 부지런하고 성실해서 실력이 아주 빨리 늘더라고. 다만 그 애가 목표로 하는 뛰어난 의술을 터득하려면 한참 멀었지. 가끔 스스로 엄청 부담을 느끼는 것 같아…. 기회 되면 네가 좀 도와줄 수 있을까? 그 애의 스승으로서 부탁 좀 할게, 정말 고마워
|vo_08_01_rm             = Geu aineun deryeowasseul dangsi geuljareul hanado mot ilgeotjiman keun munjeneun eopsseosseo. Bujireonhago seongsilhaeseo sillyeogi aju ppalli neuldeorago. Daman geu aega mokpyoro haneun ttwieonan uisureul teodeukharyeomyeon hancham meoreotji. Gakkeum seuseuro eomcheong budameul neukkineun geot gata... Gihoe doemyeon nega jom dowajul su isseulkka? Geu ae-ui seuseung'euroseo butak jom halge, jeongmal gomawo.
|vo_08_01_tl             = That kid didn't know how to read when I took her in first, but there was no big problem with it. She has been diligent and sincere, so she got good at it pretty fast. But she is still far away from the outstanding medical practice she is aiming for. I feel like she pressures herself too much sometimes... If you have an opportunity, can you help her? I'm requesting this as her teacher, thank you so much.

|vo_08_02_title          = 사이노에 대해·대풍기관
|vo_08_02_subtitle       = About [[Cyno]]: General Mahamatra
|vo_08_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Cyno - General Mahamatra.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx             = 사이노를 만나고 싶다고? 그럼 단도직입적으로 말할게. 그에게 공적인 일로 시달려 보면 정말 기겁하게 될걸. 평소엔 대풍기관처럼 높은 사람을 보는 건 쉽지 않아. 근데 가끔 간다르바 성곽 근처에서 몰래 콜레이를 지켜보더라고. 본인은 숨기고 싶어 하는데 난 소리만으로도 사이노라는 걸 알 수 있어
|vo_08_02_rm             = Sainoreul mannago sipdago? Geureom dandojikipjeogeuro malhalge. Geuege gongjeogin illo sidallyeo bomyeon jeongmal gigeophage doelgeol. Pyeongsoen daepunggigwancheoreom nopeun sarameul boneun geon swipji ana. Geunde gakkeum Gandareuba seonggwak geuncheoeseo mollae Kolleireul jikyeobodeorago. Bonineun sumgigo sipeo haneunde nan sorimaneurodo Sainoraneun geol al su isseo.
|vo_08_02_tl             = You want to meet Cyno? Let me tell you straightforwardly. If you get pestered by him with public matters, you will really startled. At normal occasions, it is not easy to meet such a high-ranking person like the General Mahamatra. But he occasionally secretly looks after Collei at Gandharva Ville. He himself wants to hide it, but I know only by sound that it's Cyno.

|vo_08_03_title          = 사이노에 대해·왜일까?
|vo_08_03_subtitle       = About Cyno: Good Question
|vo_08_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_03_quest          = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Cyno - Good Question.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx             = 교수님이 구출된 후로, 교수님께 안부 편지를 썼어. 근데 누가 벌써 내 이름으로 방문했다 하시더라고. 그리고 답장 말미에 이런 문제 하나를 더하셨어. 「왜 대풍기관이 수메르의 『권위』에 기대 현자들의 명성을 되살리겠다고 하는 게냐?」라고…<br />좋은 질문이지. 대체 왜일까?
|vo_08_03_rm             = 
|vo_08_03_tl             = 

|vo_08_04_title          = 알하이탐에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle       = About [[Alhaitham]]
|vo_08_04_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Alhaitham.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx             = 알하이탐을 조심해. 그가 나쁘다는 건 아니지만 늘 너무 이성적이어서 평범한 사람들이 이해하기 힘든 부분이 많거든. 못 믿겠으면 그의 룸메이트를 찾아가 봐. 항상 알하이탐 때문에 화가 잔뜩 나 있으니까
|vo_08_04_rm             = Alhaitameul josimhae. Geuga nappeudaneun geon anijiman neul neomu iseongjeogieoseo pyeongbeomhan saramdeuri ihaehagi himdeun bubuni mankeodeun. Mot mitgesseumyeon geu-ui rummeiteureul chajaga bwa. Hangsang Alhaitam ttaemune hwaga jantteuk na isseunikka.
|vo_08_04_tl             = Be careful of Alhaitham. I'm not saying he's bad, but he is too rational that there are parts of him where ordinary people cannot understand. If you can't trust me, go and find his roommate. He's always angry because of Alhaitham.

|vo_08_05_title          = 카베에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle       = About [[Kaveh]]
|vo_08_05_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Kaveh.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx             = 카베는 수메르의 유명한 건축사야. 대표작으로는 아주 눈에 띄는 카자르자레궁이 있지. 궁전을 설계할 때 나한테 괜찮은 관상용 식물을 추천받아 가기도 했어. 어떻게 된 건지 궁전이 완공되고 빚더미에 올랐지만. 지금은 후배인 알하이탐의 도움을 받아 그의 집에 얹혀사는 중이래. 이걸… 다행이라 해야 할지 불행이라 해야 할지…
|vo_08_05_rm             = Kabeneun Sumereu-ui yumyeonghan geonchuksaya. Daepyojageuroneun aju nune ttuineun Kajareujaregung'i itji. Gungjeoneul seolgyehal ttae nahante gwaenchaneun gwansang'yong sikmureul chucheonbada gagido haesseo. Eotteotge doen geonji gungjeoni wangongdoego bitdeomie ollatjiman. Jigeumeun hubaein Alhaitam-ui doumeul bada geu-ui jibe eonchyeosaneun jung'irae. Igeol... dahaeng'ira haeya halji bulhaeng'ira haeya halji...
|vo_08_05_tl             = Kaveh is a famous architect of Sumeru. His major work is the notable Palace of Alcazarzaray. When he planned the palace, he got recommended ornamental plants by me, too. I don't know what happened, but he got in debt after the palace was finished being built. I heard that he is living off his junior Alhaithan's house by his help. Should I... say it is a good thing or a further misfortune...

|vo_08_06_title          = 도리에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle       = About [[Dori]]
|vo_08_06_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_06_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Dori.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx             = 명성이 자자한 산게마 바이 어르신은 바로 도리야. 전에 연구에 희귀한 재료가 필요했는데, 비밀스러운 공급 루트를 가진 도리만이 구할 수 있는 거여서 그때부터 안면을 트게 됐어. 으음… 어떤 물건을 구했는지, 뭘 연구했는지는 물어보지 마, 응!
|vo_08_06_rm             = Myeongseong'i jajahan Sangema Bai eoreusineun baro Doriya. Jeone yeongue huigwihan jaeryoga piryohaetneunde, bimilseureoun gonggeup ruteureul gajin Dorimani guhal su itneun geoyeoseo geuttaebuteo anmyeoneul teuge dwaesseo. Eueum... eotteon mulgoneul guhaetneunji, mwol yeon'guhaetneunjineun mureoboji ma, eung!
|vo_08_06_tl             = The highly reputed Lore Sangemah Bay is Dori. I needed a rare ingredient in a research before, and it was something that only Dori who has a secret supply route can obtain, so we became acquaintances from then. Hmm... don't question me about what I got, and what I researched!

|vo_08_07_title          = 레일라에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle       = About [[Layla]]
|vo_08_07_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_07_quest          = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_07_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Layla.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx             = 그녀에 대해 들어본 적 있어. 그 명성이 자자하다는 「몽유 괴인」이잖아. 「몽유」에 대한 소문은 가지각색이야. 그녀가 엄청난 괴력으로 야밤에 아루 마을을 습격했다든지, 맨손으로 방사벽을 넘었다든지…. 심지어는 자면서 십만 자 정도 되는 논문을 쓴다고도 들었어! 이게 다 무슨 뚱딴지같은 소리야
|vo_08_07_rm             = 
|vo_08_07_tl             = 

|vo_08_08_title          = 리사에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle       = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_08_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_08_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx             = 사이노가 자신의 그 선배에 대해 말한 적이 있어. 보기 드문 천재에, 박학다식하고 엄청난 재능이 있었지만 일찍이 몬드로 돌아갔다고 해. 설마 공부하면서 「지식」의 무서운 면을 봐버린 걸까…?
|vo_08_08_rm             = Sainoga jasinui geu seonbae'e daehae malhan jeogi isseo. Bogi deumun cheonjae'e bakhakdasikhago eomcheonghan jaeneung'i isseotjiman iljjigi Mondeuro doragatdago hae. Seolma gongbuhamyeonseo "Jisik"-ui museoun myeoneun bwabeorin geolkka...?
|vo_08_08_tl             = Cyno told me about his senior. A rare genius, knowledgable and skilled, but I heard she returned to Mondstadt too soon. Did she see the scary side of "Knowledge" while studying...?

|vo_08_09_title          = 작은 쿠사나리 화신에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle       = About [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]]
|vo_08_09_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_09_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Lesser Lord Kusanali.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx             = 학교 다닐 때 이런 말을 들은 적이 있어. 「식물의 역사가 곧 풀의 나라의 역사다.」 말하는 사람은 별생각 없었겠지만 난 이 말에 깊은 뜻이 숨겨져 있다고 생각해. 만약 작은 풀의 신을 만나는 날이 온다면 내게 설명해 주시려나?
|vo_08_09_rm             = Hakgyo danil ttae ireon mareul deureun jeogi isseo. "Sikmul-ui yeoksaga got pul-ui nara-ui yeoksada." Malhaneun sarameun byeolsaenggak eopsseotjiman nan i mare gipeun tteusi sumgyeojyeo itdago saenggakhae. Manyak jageun pul-ui sineul mannaneul nari ondamyeon naege seolmyeonghae jusiryeona?
|vo_08_09_tl             = I heard those words when I went to school. "The history of plants is the history of the land of Dendro." The person who spoke this mustn't have put much thought to it, but I think it has a deep meaning. If I meet the Lesser Lord, will she explain it to me?

|vo_08_10_title          = 데히야에 대해…
|vo_08_10_subtitle       = About [[Dehya]]
|vo_08_10_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_10_quest          = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_10_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Dehya.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx             = 이전엔 상황이 워낙 위급해서 제대로 감사 인사도 못 했어. 그렇게 강력하고 든든한 동료가 있다는 건 정말 행운이지. 아마 그녀를 끌어들이려는 사람도 적지 않을 거야. 근데 데히야가 아카데미아나 숲의 순찰대에 들어갈 성격은 아닌 것 같아서, 난 괜한 짓 안 하려고
|vo_08_10_rm             = 
|vo_08_10_tl             = 

|vo_08_11_title          = 파루잔에 대해…
|vo_08_11_subtitle       = About [[Faruzan]]
|vo_08_11_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_11_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Faruzan.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx             = 파루잔 선배는 아는 게 많아서 종종 우림에 있는 장치들의 점검을 부탁하곤 해…. 다만 다음에 간다르바 성곽에 오실 땐 몰래 콜레이한테 먹을 거 주시는 것 좀 그만하셨으면 좋겠어. 영양분도 약처럼 적절히 균형이 잡혀야지. 과해서 좋을 게 없으니까
|vo_08_11_rm             = 
|vo_08_11_tl             = 

<!-- More About -->
|vo_09_01_title          = {name}에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle       = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx             = 우림에서의 삶은 적응할만해? 눈과 귀를 활짝 열고 안전에 유의하길 바랄게. 무슨 일 있으면 숲의 순찰자들에게 제때 알려줘
|vo_09_01_rm             = Urimeseo-ui salmeun jeogeunghalmanhae? Nungwa gwireul hwaljjak yeolgo anjeone yu'uihagil baralge. Museul il isseumyeon sup-ui sunchaljadeurege jettae allyeojwo.
|vo_09_01_tl             = Is the rainforest life adaptable? Open your eyes and ears wide, and I hope you take care of your safety. If anything happens, tell the Forest Watchers about it at the right time.

|vo_09_02_title          = {name}에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle       = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship     = 3
|vo_09_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx             = 휴, 가끔은 아무것도 모른 채로 이것저것 만져대고 입에 넣는 녀석들이 부러워&mdash;&mdash;그들의 세상에는 항상 「기적」이 존재하겠지?
|vo_09_02_rm             = Hyu, gakkeumeun amugeotdo moreun chaero igeotjeogeot manjyeodaego ibe neotneun nyeoseokdeuri bureowo &mdash; geudeul-ui sesang'eneun hangsang "Gijeok"i jonjaehagetji?
|vo_09_02_tl             = Phew, I sometimes envy people who touches and eats everything without knowing everything &mdash; in their world, "Miracles" will always exist, right?

|vo_09_03_title          = {name}에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle       = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_09_03_tx             = 아비디야 숲을 더 잘 관리하기 위해 숲의 순찰자들을 대상으로 「교육」 프로그램을 개설했어. 따지고 보면 이 프로그램은 「지식을 전파」하는 셈이지. 그렇다고 아카데미아가 뭘 어쩌겠어? 날 가두면 「비마르스탄」에 이상한 질병이 얼마나 더 많아질지 두고 보라지
|vo_09_03_rm             = Abidiya supeul deo jal gwanrihagi wihae sup-ui sunchaljadeureul daesang'euro "Gyoyuk" peurogeurameul gaeseolhaesseo. Ttajigo bomyeon i peurogeuraemeun "Jisigeul Jeonpa"haneun semiji. Geureotdago Akademiaga mwol eojjeogesseo? Nal gadumyeon "Bimareuseutan"e isanghan jilbyeong'i eolmana deo manajilji dugo boraji.
|vo_09_03_tl             = To manage Avidya forest better, I established an "Education" program for the Forest Watchers. If you take a look at it, this program is "Spreading Knowledge". But what can the Akademiya do about it? If they lock me up, let them see how many strange diseases will increase in "Bimarstan".

|vo_09_04_title          = {name}에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle       = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship     = 5
|vo_09_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx             = 이건 비밀인데 사실 난 성내에 있는 바자르의 분위기를 정말 좋아해. 거래가 활발하고 시끌벅적하잖아. 극장에서 노래하고 춤추는 사람도 있고. 그런데 시끄러운 소리는 내 귀에 좋지 않아서…. 내 뒤에서 귀를 막아준다고? 하하하, 그러면 걷기 힘들잖아! 마음은 고맙게 받을게
|vo_09_04_rm             = Ibeon bimirinde sasil nan seongnae'e itneun Bajareu-ui bunwigireul jeongmal joahae. Georaega hwalbalhago sikkeulbeokjeokhajana. Geukjang'eseo noraehago chumchuneun saramdo itgo. Geureonde sikkeureoun sorineun nae gwie jotji anaseo... Nae dwieseo gwireul magajundago? Hahaha, geureomyeon geotgi himdeuljana! Maeumeun gomapge badeulge.
|vo_09_04_tl             = This is a secret, but I really like the vibes of the Bazaar in Sumeru City. The trades are brisk, and it's crowded. There are also people who sing and dance in the theater. But loud sounds are not good for my ears... You'll close my ears behind me? Hahaha, then it would not be easy for you to walk! I'll take your intentions gratefully, though.

|vo_09_05_title          = {name}에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle       = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship     = 6
|vo_09_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx             = 어릴 때 아름답고 환상적인 꿈을 많이 꿨어. 하지만 그 꿈들은 크면서 점차 기억 속에서 사라졌지. 넌 아직도 꿈을 꾸니? 네 꿈 얘기 좀 들려줘
|vo_09_05_rm             = Eoril ttae areumdapgo hwansangjeogin kkumeul mani kkwosseo. Hajiman geu kkumdeureun keumyeonseo jeomcha gieok sogeseo sarajyeotji. Neon ajikdo kkumeul kkuni? Ne kkum yaegi jom deullyeojwo.
|vo_09_05_tl             = I dreamed many beautiful and fantastical dreams when I was young. But those dreams disappeared from my memories as I grew. Do you still dream? Tell me about your dreams.

<!-- Miscellaneous II -->
|vo_10_01_title          = {name}의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle       = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx             = 아비디야 숲에서 나뭇잎과 꽃잎들이 땅에 떨어져 있는 걸 자주 볼 수 있어. 온전한 상태로 땅에 버려져 있으면 아깝잖아…. 그래서 그것들을 주워 와서 표본으로 만들고는 해. 숲의 순찰자들을 가르칠 때 쓰기도 하고 장식품으로도 쓸 수 있으니까 일거양득이지
|vo_10_01_rm             = Abidiya supeseo namutipgwa kkotipdeuri ttang'e tteoreojyeo itneun geol jaju bol su isseo. Onjeonhan sangtaero ttang'e beoryeojyeo isseumyeon akkapjana... Geuraeseo geugeotdeureul juwo waso pyoboneuro mandeulgoneun hae. Sup-ui sunchaljadeureul gareuchil ttae sseugido hago jangsikpumeurodo sseul su isseunikka ilgeoyangdeugiji.
|vo_10_01_tl             = I can often see leaves and flower petals fallen on the ground in Avidya forest. It's such a shame that they are dumped in a complete state... so I pick them up and make them as specimen. I use them while teaching the Forest Watchers, and it can be also used as ornaments, so it's basically killing two birds with one stone.

|vo_10_02_title          = {name}의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle       = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_friendship     = 6
|vo_10_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx             = 고민? 흠… 아비디야 숲의 오염, 사고를 자주 치는 모험가, 내 꼬리로 달려드는 구조견… 이 문제들은 그래도 다 해결 방법이 있어. 큰 고민은 딱히 없는 것 같아. 이렇게 보면 숲의 순찰관은 정말 단순한 삶을 사는 것 같네
|vo_10_02_rm             = Gomin? Heum... Abidiya sup-ui oyeom, sagoreul jaju chineun moheomga, nae kkoriro dallyeodeuneun gujogyeon... i munjedeureun geuraedo da haegyeol bangbeobi isseo. Keun gomineun ttakhi eopneun geot gata. Ireotge bomyeon sup-ui sunchalgwaneun jeongmal dansunhan salmeul saneun geot gatne.
|vo_10_02_tl             = Concerns? Hmm... the pollution in Avidya forest, an adventurer who goes through accidents often, the rescue dog that runs into my tail... but those problems all have a solution. I don't think I have a particular concern. Speaking of which, looking from this point of view, it seems like a Forest Watcher has a very simple life.

|vo_10_03_title          = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle       = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx             = 희한한 말이긴 한데, 내 몸속에는 육식동물의 피가 흐르고 있지만 내가 가장 끊을 수 없는 음식은 버섯이야. 식용 버섯은 종류가 다양해. 신선한 것이든 말린 것이든 각각 독특한 향이 있지. 고기와 함께 삶으면 고기향도 버섯향에 밀린다니까
|vo_10_03_rm             = Huihanhan marigin hande, nae momsogeneun yuksikdongmul-ui piga heureugo itjiman naega gajang kkeuneul su eopneun eumsigeun beoseosiya. Sigyong beoseoseun jongryuga dayanghae. Sinseonhan geosideun mallin geosideun gakgak dokteukhan hyang'i itji. Gogiwa hamkke salmeumyeon gogihyangdo beoseothyang'e millindanikka.
|vo_10_03_tl             = It's kind of a weird word, but even though there is a blood of a carnivore in my body, what I cannot stop eating are mushrooms. There are many various edible mushrooms. Fresh ones or dried ones, they all have their unique flavors. When boiled with meat, the meat scent gets behind the mushroom scent.

|vo_10_04_title          = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle       = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx             = 난 후각이 예민해서 향신료가 많이 들어간 음식은 잘 못 먹어. 휴, 수메르에서 이건 정말 안타까운 일이지
|vo_10_04_rm             = Nan hugagi yeminhaeseo hyangsinryoga mani deureogan eumsigeun jal mot meogeo. Hyu, Sumereueseo igeon jeongmal antakkaun iriji.
|vo_10_04_tl             = I have a sensitive smell, so I cannot eat food with too much spice in it. Phew, it is such a regrettable thing in Sumeru.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title          = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle       = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx             = 양질의 식자재와 절묘한 향신료의 맛. 한마디로&mdash;&mdash;엄청 맛있어
|vo_11_01_rm             = Yangjil-ui sikjajaewa jeolmyohan hyangsinryo-ui mat. Hanmadiro &mdash; eomcheong masisseo.
|vo_11_01_tl             = Ingredients of good quality and the excellent taste of spice. In one sentence &mdash; it's delicious.

|vo_11_02_title          = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle       = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx             = 괜찮은 조합이네. 레시피 하나만 적어줄래? 숲의 순찰대의 다음 회식 메뉴에 넣고 싶어
|vo_11_02_rm             = Gwaenchaneun johabine. Resipi hanaman jeogeojullae? Sup-ui sunchaldae-ui daeum hoesik menyue neotgo sipeo.
|vo_11_02_tl             = What a decent combination. Mind writing me a recipe? I want to put this in the next get-together menu of the Forest Watchers.

|vo_11_03_title          = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle       = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx             = …새로운 메뉴 좀 가르쳐줄까?
|vo_11_03_rm             = ...Saeroun menyu jom gareuchyeojulkka?
|vo_11_03_tl             = ...Want me to teach you a new menu?

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_11_04_title          = 생일…
|vo_11_04_subtitle       = Birthday
|vo_11_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_11_04_tx             = 생일 축하해! 선물로 꽃이 만개한 분재와 가드닝 지침서를 준비했어. 「숲의 순찰관 평생 보육 증서」가 있으니 만약 무슨 문제가 생기면 언제든지 날 찾아와.<br />그거 알아? 네 생일 때 피는 꽃이 정말 많아서 한참 동안 골랐어. 내년에는 새로운 꽃을 선물해 줄게!
|vo_11_04_rm             = Saeng'il chukhahae! Seonmullo kkochi mangaehan bunjaewa gadeuning jichimseoreul junbihaesseo. "Sup-ui Sunchalgwan Pyeongsaeng Boyuk Jeungseo"ga isseuni manyak museun munjega saenggimyeon eonjedeunji nal chajawa.<br />Geugeo ara? Ne saeng'il ttae pineun kkochi jeongmal manaseo hancham dong'an gollasseo. Naenyeoneneun saeroun kkocheul seonmulhae julge!
|vo_11_04_tl             = Happy birthday! As a present, I prepared a potted plant in full bloom and a gardening guide. There's the "Forest Watcher's Lifetime Nurture Certificate", so if there's any problem with it, come and find my anytime.<br />Do you know this? That there are too many flowers that bloom at your birthday, I struggled to choose one for a long time. Next year, I'll gift you a new flower!

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_12_01_title          = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_12_01_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_12_01_ascension      = 1
|vo_12_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx             = 씨앗에서 싹이 나고, 흙을 뚫고 뿌리를 내렸어
|vo_12_01_rm             = Ssiaseseo ssagi nago, heugeul ttulko ppurireul naeryeosseo.
|vo_12_01_tl             = The seed sprouted, and it rooted through soil.

|vo_12_02_title          = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_12_02_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_12_02_ascension      = 2
|vo_12_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_12_02_tx             = 새싹이 자라나 가지를 뻗고 잎을 펼쳤어
|vo_12_02_rm             = Saessagi jarana gajireul ppeotgo ipeul pyeolchyeosseo.
|vo_12_02_tl             = The sprout grew, spread branches and leaves.

|vo_12_03_title          = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_12_03_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_12_03_ascension      = 4
|vo_12_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_12_03_tx             = 꽃망울이 피니까 봄의 기운이 물씬 풍기네
|vo_12_03_rm             = Kkotmang'uri pinikka bom-ui giuni mulssin punggine.
|vo_12_03_tl             = As the bud blooms, it feels like spring a lot.

|vo_12_04_title          = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_12_04_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_ascension      = 6
|vo_12_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_12_04_tx             = 열매가 잘 익었어. 내일이 되면 더 풍성해지겠지?
|vo_12_04_rm             = Yeolmaega jal igeosseo. Naeiri doemyeon deo pungseonghaejigetji?
|vo_12_04_tl             = The fruit is ripen. It'll become more abundant tomorrow, right?
}}
